text: Petrus Joannes Antonius "Piet" van der Sanden (11 November 1924 - 18 January 2015) was a Dutch politician and journalist. He was a member of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands between 1971 and 1972 and again from 1973 to 1989 for the Catholic People's Party and later the Christian Democratic Appeal. He also served a stint as member of the European Parliament between 1973 and 1974. Piet van der Sanden was born in Gouda, South Holland. He died on 18 January 2015 in The Hague, South Holland, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Parlement.com biography Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch journalists Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:MEPs for the Netherlands Category:People from Gouda Category:Politicians from South Holland Category:Writers from South Holland
title: Piet van der Sanden
